items.title: Troubleshoot performance issues with Traces
items.desc:
ZincObserve and Zplane collects and analyzes trace data, allowing teams to understand the flow of requests through their systems and identify bottlenecks and latency issues. With distributed tracing, you can accurately locate performanc issues within your microservices architecture.

Traces are used to diagnose and debug performance issues in distributed systems by providing insights into the flow of requests and the time taken by each component to process the request. They can be used to identify bottlenecks, analyze the impact of changes, and optimize the performance of the system.

tracesData.title: How can tracing insights empower your applications?

items.title: Unified Tracing Interface
items.desc: Quickly pinpoint the root causes of issues by viewing traces alongside logs, infrastructure metrics, database queries, network calls,and frontend telemetry in a single unified interface.

items.title: Code Performance Analysis
items.desc: Enhance code performance by gaining visibility into the resource usage and execution time of each method and line of code.

items.title: Real-Time Performance Insights
items.desc: Swiftly identify the root cause of service issues through a unified dashboard displaying health metrics, dependencies, and telemetry data from your infrastructure and databases.

items.title: Code Vulnerability Scanning
items.desc: Protect your cloud applications by proactively identifying live security threats and code vulnerabilities in production, enabling you to mitigate them before they result in breaches.
